actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of Congress in opposition to the revenue procedure proposed by the Commissioner of IRS, establishing new guidelines for determining the tax-exempt status of private schools.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Declares that it is the sense of Congress that the procedure proposed by the Commissioner of the Internal Revenue Service establishing new guidelines for determining the tax-exempt status of certain private schools should be withdrawn, as it is in excess of the authority of the Commissioner to administer the revenue laws and to raise revenue.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of Congress in opposition to the revenue procedure proposed by the Commissioner of IRS, establishing new guidelines for determining the tax-exempt status of private schools.
